title: Garth Marenghi’s Darkplace
description: Dr. Rick Dagless, M.D. works at Darkplace Hospital in Romford over the literal gates of hell. He must fight the forces of darkness while coping with the pressures of day to day admin.
quote: He’d left the gate open and there was evil everywhere.
altHero: floating head of Garth Marenghi in field of stars with a floating eye behind it
alt1: Dr. Rick Dagless and Dr. Lucien Sanchez laugh
alt4: Garth screaming, standing in the middle of a satanic ritual holding two coke floats
